metadata.title: CVE-2021-26401 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: LFENCE/JMP (mitigation V2-2) may not sufficiently mitigate CVE-2017-5715 onsome AMD CPUs.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
